thread.title: Extremely disappointing if doping case proves to be positive - IOC

title: Extremely disappointing if doping case proves to be positive - IOC
text:
Extremely disappointing if doping case proves to be positive - IOC 11:20am GMT - 00:33 
IOC President's spokesman Mark Adams says if reports of doping were confirmed, it would be ''extremely disappointing''. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
IOC President's spokesman Mark Adams says if reports of doping were confirmed, it would be "extremely disappointing". Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2sDeMVb
